abstract: Neighborhood Joint column on Urban Glass, studio in Fort Greene, Brooklyn, where glass blowers can practice their craft in space providing both equipment and community of artistic collaborators.
lead_paragraph: UrbanGlass in Fort Greene, Brooklyn, gives glass blowers access to the space and expensive equipment they need to practice their craft.
snippet: UrbanGlass in Fort Greene, Brooklyn, gives glass blowers access to the space and expensive equipment they need to practice their craft....

headline.main: For the Sake of Art: Risk and Reward at 2,000 Degrees
headline.print_headline: If You Can Stand the Heat
